ticket: With the JR Pass, you can get assigned seating to guarantee a seat. Here, I was assigned Car 4 Seat 10-D.
street: Sapporo: outside my hostel. This was the first picture I took in Japan with my camera.
cup: A decorative chocolate cup from Meissen, Germany.
tower: Sapporo Clock Tower on a rainy Sapporo day.
pages: Agricultural notes from a Sapporo Agricultural College student's notebook.
ads: A series of print advertisements for Sapporo beer over time.
